intern.demo

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • intern.demo.MenuItem
      • intern.demo.Menu

  • public class Menu
extends MenuItem
    Description : The Menu class is inherited from its parent class (MenuItem). so it can use all methods of its parent class and display the Menu.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    :Shubham Bangar

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Menu(String displayText) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMenuItem(int choice, Menu menu, Action act)
      Description : This method is used to add Child Menu.
      void addMenuItem(int choice, String menu, Action act)
      Description : This method is used to add Parent Menu.
      void display()
      Depends on user action this method is used to display Parent Menu as well as Child(nested) Menu.
      void displayAsMenuItem()
      This method display menu items of Menu.

      • Methods inherited from class intern.demo.MenuItem

        getAction, getChoice, getDisplayText, getParent, isSelected, setAction, setChoice, setDisplayText, setParent

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Menu

        public Menu(String displayText)

    • Method Detail

      • addMenuItem

        public void addMenuItem(int choice,
                        String menu,
                        Action act)
        Description : This method is used to add Parent Menu.
        Parameters:
        choice - : It is an integer parameter to addMenuItem method to add choice in ArrayList item.
        menu - : It is an string parameter to addMenuItem method to add menu in ArrayList item.
        act - : It is a reference of Action interface which performs action on parent menu.

      • addMenuItem

        public void addMenuItem(int choice,
                        Menu menu,
                        Action act)
        Description : This method is used to add Child Menu.
        Parameters:
        choice - : It is an integer parameter to addMenuItem method to add choice in ArrayList item.
        menu - : Its is a reference of child menu to add nested menu in ArrayList item.
        act - : It is a reference of Action interface which performs action on child menu.

      • display

        public void display()
        Depends on user action this method is used to display Parent Menu as well as Child(nested) Menu.
        Overrides:
        display in class MenuItem

      • displayAsMenuItem

        public void displayAsMenuItem()
        This method display menu items of Menu.
